thread.title: Re: Stuttering Streams in various Apps
thread.title_full: Re: Stuttering Streams in various Apps

author: FredMS
title: Re: Stuttering Streams in various Apps
text:
Sunday
While using the new Google Streamer connected to a 2022 QLED Samsung TV various Streaming Apps are unwatchable because of constant micro lagging in the stream every few seconds. The audio is fine though. Netflix, Disney+ and Prime Video are affected. Double checked the issue by connecting the Box to a Hisense TV an everything worked fine. Not a HDMI issue. Internet is stable, Lan or WiFi - nothing changes.
So the problem seems to be between the TV an the Box.
Google support wasn't able to deliver any useful insights so far.
Monday
I have the same issue, also on a Samsung QLED TV. Model QE65QN95AA
Monday
I should have added, the TV is also from 2022 and I experienced the same problem on the same TV with a 4k Chromecast. One of the reasons I bought the TV streamer is because I thought that it would fix the issue.
The issue does not seem to appear when watching Youtube on the TV via the streamer.
9m ago
Returned the box today - I'm not going to spend money on being s beta tester üíÅüèª
